Query the amount of available items in the warehouse by resourceID

Returns:
the amount of the item in the warehouse

pickupItems

                    int amount)
                    throws NotEnoughItemException
Remove the amount of items from the warehouse

Parameters:
resourceID - the resourceID of the item in the warehouse
amount - the amount of items need to be picked up
Returns:
true if the operation is successfully; otherwise false
Throws:

                    int amount)
Complement the amount of items to the warehouse

Parameters:
resourceID - the resourceID of the item in the warehouse
amount - the amount of items need to complement
Returns:

holdItems

java.lang.String holdItems(java.lang.String resourceID,
                           int amount)
                           throws NotEnoughItemException
Hold some items for later use. The holding items are invisible to the query operation. The items can only be accessed by the ID of the holding request.

Parameters:
resourceID - the resourceID of the item in the warehouse
amount - the amount of items need to be held
Returns:
the ID of the holding request (the ID can be used to pickup items or cancel the holding)
Throws:
NotEnoughItemException

cancelHoldingItems

void cancelHoldingItems(java.lang.String holdingID)
Cancel the holding request. The holding items are released.

Parameters:
holdingID - the ID of the holding request

pickupHoldingItems

boolean pickupHoldingItems(java.lang.String holdingID)
                           throws InvalidHoldingIDException
Pick up the holding items. Remove holding items from the warehouse

Parameters:
holdingID - the ID of the holding request
Returns:
true if the operation is successful; otherwise false
Throws:
the - holdingID is invalid
InvalidHoldingIDException
